title: Bug 2120 – MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not being persisted between sessions in the application. The files that are opened in the previous session are not displayed in the File menu MRU list after restarting the application. However, they should be persisted and appear in the list.
OB: The files that were opened in the previous session are not displayed in the File menu MRU list after restarting the application.
EB: The files that were opened in the previous session should be persisted and appear in the File menu MRU list after restarting the application.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the workbench. 2. Open 2 or 3 files. 3. Shutdown the workbench. 4. Restart the workbench.
